data.message: Can you go back to fixing the new bugs with the app? I was hoping the post was a no stress we are aware and fixing things -_-

replies.message: Hey Stephanie. We recommend you uninstall and reinstall the app. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1BmHKph. -Sidney
I have twice, my boyfriend as well is having this issue on his cell and also on our tablet thanks for responding.
Thanks for taking the time to let us know, Stephanie. Please hang tight while our team looks into these issues. We appreciate your patience. -Sidney
Sidney, I appreciate you taking the time to look into this. Never forget you make a difference! #positivevibes
I thought that was a bunch of BS from the beginning!,
How do I close in account that I already close and how do I get contact with fb
